Subject: Family Photographs
Title: Large group of people assembling at the edge of a field
Description:
This photograph could have been taken during the visit of 250 members of the Federation of Old Cornwall Societies described in the West Briton and Cornwall Advertiser on Thursday 6th July 1939 to Stanley Opie's excavation at Carwarthen, near St Just-in-Roseland.

Many of the visitors can be seen wearing badges.
Creator: Stanley Opie
